name: pOp! (itch) (pegiachini)
description:
pOp! is a fun, hyper casual game for Web and Mobile platforms.

The player bubblle has to soar through the environment pOpping! smaller bubbles to increase in size and energy, while avoiding being pOpped! by larger bubbles.

This project is my first game prototype, developed from concept idea to visual identity and programming, and is part of a series of prototypes I'm researching on the topic of interactive design.
